search.custom: * By default returns all rows where the column contains yer search. Ye can use operators such as: = (equals), != (does not equal), > (greater than), < (less than) or ! (doesn't contain) at the beginnin' of yer search string. Ye can also search for multiple values by separatin' them with a comma.

login.description: Please login with the same Discord account that is linked to the user ye have yer staff permissions on, matey. Using a different one will result in ye not bein' able to access the server panel.

logs.damage_description: On this page ye can view and filter the damage logs, arrr.
logs.dark_chat_description: On this page ye can view and filter dark chat messages, arrr.
logs.description: On this page ye can view and filter the server logs, matey.

detail.description: This be explainin' in more detail how user '{0}' left the game, arrr.
detail.read_more: Read more about disconnect reasons, matey...

reasons.another: The user directly connected to another server without first disconnectin' from this one, arrr.
reasons.banned: The user was banned by a staff member with the given reason, arrr.
reasons.config: While connectin', the server's configuration was unable to load, causin' the user to get rejected, arrr.
reasons.crash: The user's game crashed with the given error message, arrr.
reasons.disconnected: The user disconnected from the server by typin' 'disconnect' in the F8 console or similar, arrr.
reasons.doors: The server tried to synchronize doors with the client but failed, so it kicked the user as it cannot recover from this error, arrr.
reasons.editor: The player opened their Rockstar Editor which automatically leaves the server ye're currently in, arrr.
reasons.exited: Th' user sailed out o' th' game by typin' 'quit' in th' F8 console or pressin' ALT an' F4 or similar.
reasons.global: Th' system caught wind that th' user be likely up t' somethin' nefarious an' handed out a global OP-FW ban.
reasons.job: Th' user's job priority walked th' plank. This means th' user was in th' queue too long for th' job priority, so th' system gave 'em th' boot.
reasons.kicked: Th' user was tossed overboard by a crew member with th' given reason.
reasons.overflow: Safety measure by FiveM as protection from scallywags floodin' yer server with events.
reasons.reloading_game: Th' user loaded a single-player adventure by usin' th' 'localGame' command in th' F8 console or similar.
reasons.restart: Th' user was sent t' Davy Jones' locker by th' server as it was restartin'.
reasons.timeout: Th' user's connection t' th' server timed out. This be usually th' case when th' internet seas get stormy.
reasons.unknown: No detailed description available. Ye can ask a developer fer more help.

detail.title: Detailed disconnect reason

logs.diff_label: Passed time since log entry below

show.source_helpful_details: Amount of "helpful" actions performed by this crew member in the last 30 days. This means using commands that be generally more used to help OTHER mateys: /tp_player, /tp_here, /tp_to, /spectate, /staffpm, /wipe, /freeze, /unfreeze, /job, /reset_job, /revive and /revive_range (others only) with commands more commonly used to troll other crew like /slap and /damage excluded, arrr.
show.source_notes_details: Amount o' notes, warnings and strikes issued by this crew member in the last 30 days.

show.system_caption: Scallywags detected by this detection. Green be still banned, red be not.
show.system_details: The {0} detection was triggered {1} times in the last 6 months, affecting {2} scallywags (about {3}x per scallywag). {4} of which be still banned and {5} of which be not. This results an estimated accuracy of about {6}%.
show.system_no_details: The {0} detection has not been triggered in the last 6 months.
show.unban_system_confirm: This scallywag was automatically banned by the system. Be ye sure ye want to remove this ban? Type "confirm" to confirm.
